entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
